title: The Wilkinsburg school closing is not a done deal
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Opinion - Today 
I am writing in response to the Oct. 18 article “Wilkinsburg Alums Gather for Their Last Homecoming.” It paints a picture of Wilkinsburg...
